title: My rework version of Udyr that I hope riot can have a look
body:
Passive: Mark of the spirits
If an champion or a large/epic monster is hit by Udyr's attack or ability twice, a mark will be placed by Udyr. 
If an enemy with a mark is attacked by Udyr, a special effect will be triggered base on Udyr's current stance.
Strength of the beasts: Grants a stun and bonus attack speed for a few seconds
Resolute of the tortoise: Grants a shield and percentage heal based on Udyr's max health
Wings of the phoenix: Grants movement speed and deal magic damage to all enemies nearby.
After the mark is triggered, the enemy cant receive stacks from Udyr for the next few seconds.
Q: Strength of the beasts:
Udyr unleash the spirits of tiger/bear/(can be any powerful beast in skins like dinosaurs), deals physical damage to one target at a time (Can attack plants but wont be displaced by the blast cone)the spirit can be controlled by Udyr to attack or change targets, but it isn't considered as a minion therefore it can't be attacked  or enpowered. (Not a pet like old malzahar's passive)
This spirit will attack more and more rapidly for the same target, it's attack can only stack once for Udyr's passive, and will disappear after a few seconds.
W: Resolute of the tortoise:
Udyr create a wall that stops enemies from dashing through but can walk through normally before a delay. After the delay, it will be considered as a terrain that last for a few seconds. If an enemy is blocked by it or hit by terrain, a stack of passive will be granted. 
E: Wings of the phoenix:
Udyr charges up, taking a fight to a direction, push all enemies on this path along then deal magic damage in a cone in front of you. 
During the fight, Udyr is immune to death or crowd control.
R: The great stampede （Go go power rangers）
Udyr target at an enemy champion, unleash all the powers of the spirits in his body, and starting to charge at the location, executing all minions along the path. During the stampede, Udyr  is immune to any crowd control and cant cancel this ability. This charge will be stopped if any allies of Udyr collides with a enemy champion. This enemy will be marked by Udyr's passive instantly.
Allies can join the stampede by right-clicking on Udyr when he start charging.  Then they will gain the same effects on him.(Including the execution) When he start charging, they will stand behind or aside him.
